meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>printing</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to print</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: When you print something out, it's usually the paperwork needed in order to <reading>sue</reading> (す) someone. You're just that kind of person, always looking to sue.
